title: A Man Requesting Dr Zakir Naik to Open a Branch of IIS in Chennai - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: I am Mohammad Kaja Modi retired officer Madras University assalam alikum Dr Zak sah sir you have told that you have open Islamic International School in bombai I request you why not you open slamic school in Chennai and other parts of the press because this is the need of the day today sir thank you sir you give me the land and give me the funds inshah I'll open [Applause] it thank you very much
